import React from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux" const mapStateToProps = (state) =>{ return { productincart : state} } class CartPage extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state ={ total: 0 } } componentDidMount(){ this.totalcount(0,0) } totalcount = (total,i)=>{ if(i
{this.props.productincart.map(cartitem =>
{cartitem.productname} So luong
{cartitem.price}
)}
Total
Total Price {this.state.total+" VND"}
Discount 0
Total Pay {this.state.total+" VND"}
) } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CartPage)
